dcterms:description: The CAPE dataset consists of 3D meshes of 15 clothed people in motion. It is used to compute TSDFs for various frames, allowing for the analysis of temporal sequences in 3D data.
dcterms:title: CAPE dataset

dcterms:creator: D. Vlasic

dcterms:description: The Articulated Mesh Animation dataset contains 10 mesh sequences depicting 3 different humans performing various actions. It is used to compute TSDFs for analyzing dynamic 3D scenes.
dcterms:title: Articulated Mesh Animation dataset
